LOD Cloud September 2008
Facts:
•More than 35 datasets interlinked
•Commercial players joined the cloud, e.g., 
BBC
•Companies began to publish and host 
dataset, e.g. OpenLink, Talis, or Garlik.
•Size approx. 2 billion triples, 3 million links

LOD Cloud March 2009
Facts:
•Big part from Linking Open Drug cloud and 
the BIO2RDF project (bottom)
•Notable new datasets: Freebase, 
OpenCalais ACM/IEEE
OpenCalais, ACM/IEEE
•Size > 10 billion triples
